short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome plugin that uses Machine Learning and Natural Language Process to help building a better, more rational web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
- Detect and show warnings about clickbait (work in progress)
- Show media bias (Liberal, Conservative, etc)
- Identify exploits of common cognitive biases (work in progress)
